title: Sudden major packet loss in-game plus other trouble
body: I was playing some ARAM a little while ago and about half way through my ping shot up to about 85 from 32 and I started to get basically unplayable packet loss. Then after the game ended, the stats didn't load and now even if I click the Play button it doesn't actually do anything but show a never-ending loading circle after about 30 or so seconds. Is anybody else having issues like this? I'd like to know if it's just a problem on my end or not. My ISP is TPG.
